original_title: Court blocks IUSF movement in Colombo
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Fort Magistrate's Court issued an order preventing the Inter-University Students' Federation from entering several areas in Colombo on Thursday (10).
The IUSF had planned for a protest against government attempts to privatize free education in the country.
The protest is planned to commence at 12:30 PM from Lipton Circus, Colombo.
